name: Monsters Killers
description:
Você pode escolher entre ser, samanta, sam e sarah, que matam demonios/monstros, etc. Então jogue mate todos eles >:), incluindo a lider entre eles, a [???].

You can choose between being, samanta, sam and sarah, that kills demons/monsters, etc. Then play and kill all of them >:), including the leader between them, the [???]
